workflows.summary: Workflow development patterns, branch protection, and agent attribution

agents.summary: Agent system behavior, coordination patterns, and performance insights

tools.summary: Tool development best practices and common patterns

instructions.summary: Guidance for creating effective path-specific instructions

quick_reference.agent_mentions: Always use @agent-name syntax for agent references
quick_reference.branch_protection: Never push directly to main, always create PR
quick_reference.workflow_references: Include workflow name and run ID in created issues/PRs
quick_reference.issue_updates: Comment on issues when work completes with @agent attribution
quick_reference.context_awareness: Check for .context.md files before starting work
